SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller class of the game. It provides all the methods that modify the model. All the view messages call one of the GameController's methods.

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • gameInit

      public void gameInit()
      Method that creates the Game with all the cards and the observer. It is called at the beginning of the run method of the NetworkManager

    • createGame

      public void createGame(int maxPlayers, String nickname, double ID)
      Method that creates the game The first player Object is created and the maxPlayers attribute is set
      Parameters:
      maxPlayers - the user's choice that defines how many players the game will have
      nickname - the nickname that the user chose
      ID - univocal ID for the client object

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(String nickname, double ID)
      method that makes a user join the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the user
      ID - univocal ID for the client object

    • quit

      public void quit(double ID) throws IOException
      if this method is called before the beginning of the game, it will remove the player object of the caller else, it will separate the client from the Player object. If only one player remains online after disconnecting the caller, this method will start a timer. if this timer expires, the remaining player will be declared as the winner and the program will end.
      Parameters:
      ID - univocal ID for the client
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong with the unRegisterClient method

    • reJoinGame

      public void reJoinGame(String nickname, double ID)
      method that makes the user rejoin the game it checks whether the player can or can't reconnect
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname that the user had before crashing/quitting
      ID - univocal ID for the client

    • playStarterCard

      public void playStarterCard(boolean flipped, double ID)
      method that places the starter card at the center of the player's board. Directly calls the board methods
      Parameters:
      flipped - the side on which the player chose to play the card
      ID - univocal ID for the client

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color, double ID)
      method that sets the player color according to their choice
      Parameters:
      color - color chosen by the user
      ID - univocal ID for the client

    • updatePublicGoals

      public void updatePublicGoals()
      method that draws the 2 public goals

    • choosePrivateGoals

      public void choosePrivateGoals(int choice, double ID)
      method that sets the private goals chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      choice - integer corresponding to one of the two private goals proposed
      ID - univocal ID for the client

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int card, int row, int column, boolean flipped, double ID)
      method that plays the card that the player chose to play. It calls the corresponding game method. If something goes wrong, it will set the errorString linked to the player and the gameObserver will notify about it
      Parameters:
      card - card that the user wants to play
      row - chosen row of the matrix
      column - chosen column of the matrix
      flipped - side on which to play the card
      ID - univocal ID for the caller client

    • drawFromTheDeck

      public void drawFromTheDeck(int deck, double ID)
      method that makes the player draw from the deck they chose to draw from. It calls the corresponding game method. If something goes wrong, it will set the errorString linked to the player and the gameObserver will notify about it
      Parameters:
      deck - deck to draw from
      ID - univocal ID for the caller client

    • drawFromPublicCards

      public void drawFromPublicCards(int card, double ID)
      method that makes the player draw the public card they chose from. It calls the corresponding game method. If something goes wrong, it will set the errorString linked to the player and the gameObserver will notify about it
      Parameters:
      card - integer corresponding to one of the 4 public cards
      ID - univocal ID for the caller client

    • whisper

      public void whisper(String receiver, String message, double ID)
      method that sends a chat message to a specified user
      Parameters:
      receiver - nickname of the receiver user
      message - message to send
      ID - univocal ID for the caller client

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast(String message, double ID)
      broadcasts a message to every player in the game
      Parameters:
      message - message to send
      ID - univocal ID for the caller client

    • handOutStarterCards

      public void handOutStarterCards()
      method called by the network manager object which gives out the starter cards to all the players.

    • handOutPrivateGoals

      public void handOutPrivateGoals()
      method called by the network manager object which hands out the private goals to each player

    • handOutCards

      public void handOutCards()
      method called by the network manager object which gives out the cards to all the players. calls the corresponding game method
